div.div: More news from Dr. Collins regarding the COVID-19 School Closure . . . School Closure extended until May 15th.
During these difficult times, PHCS would like to remind families that the BACKPACK PROGRAM is available.

img.alt: We Miss Our Students! Featured Photo

div.div: Our staff has created a special message for our students to let them know we are always thinking about them! Just click the link to view!

img.alt: IMPORTANT: Meal Delivery Update Featured Photo
Digital Learning Update for Families Featured Photo

div.div: Check out our weekly update from the principals!
Please take a moment to read the following and most recent communication from our Superintendent.

Part of our preparation effort is assessing and addressing the ability of students to continue learning remotely from home through digital instruction. Please take a moment to complete this two-question survey.
Parishville-Hopkinton Central School is taking steps to minimize the risks to our school community.
Check out our Fall Newsletter! There's so much going on at PHCS!!
